description:
Yukino`s youngest sister believes she is being stalked by a girl from her school. Kano confronts the girl and they both realize that it was a mere coincidence that they kept running into each other. They become friends and Kano`s older sister, Tsukino has an admirer in Kano`s friend who wants her (Tsukino) to her big sister.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: A Different Story from Up to Now
Un épisode pas comme les autres (II)
これまでと違うお話し
